sentence.Network_en: The soldier turned his waxlike features toward him.
sentence.Network_cn: 这名士兵把像腊一样的脸转向他.

PerfectNetExp.abs: Waxy or waxlike ., 蜡的 ; 象蜡的.

sentences.sentence: "the poor face with the same awful waxen pallor"- Bram Stoker
"the soldier turned his waxlike features toward him"
"a thin face with a waxy paleness"

auth_sentence.content: It was filled with a waxlike substance, the middle of which had a round indentation, in the shape of a small ball.
